website_summaries.verdict: Tea lights for keeping away pesky mosquitoes while relaxing on your patio, porch, or deck. Includes 12 votive-style tea lights.
pros: Pleasant scent is a deterrent to mosquitoes
Can be used indoors and outdoors
About a four-hour burn time, though some say the burn time is longer
Glass votive holders are elegant and decorative
cons: Not 100% effective at keeping mosquitoes away

customer_reviews.title: Not a bite
customer_reviews.text: Had been getting bites until we lit these candles up... One bite since we put them out. Not too much of a scent which is good for us.. and helpful if used indoors...Only negative is that they are small and won't last too long..
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: N
customer_reviews.text: Have not been lid but surprise to see that the candle holders are plastic and not glass...this is why I gave a 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Luigar

customer_reviews.title: Did not keep mosquitoes away
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice but it did not keep the mosquitoes away
customer_reviews.author: Ekat

customer_reviews.title: What I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The clear cup candles worked great. Nice scent and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: MKirksey

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Perfect size, we used them as part of the table decoration at my daughter's graduation party. Kept the bugs and flies away.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly_Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Good looking candle
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a party, and it was so cold out we didn’t light them, but they smell great and look much nicer than the classic citronella candles that are in big green tins!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately does not work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately does not work. I kept trying, but was bitten by mosquitoes anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scent
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, it's a mild lemon smell and it repels bugs immediately. It works great in my office as well for fruit flys.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Byers

customer_reviews.title: Item works
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 different kinds of citronella for the mosquitos, I found this one worked better and longer
customer_reviews.author: benita rouse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scent and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: These candles were perfect for outdoor entertainment. They were very decorative when used with votive holders.
customer_reviews.author: TDreviews

product_meta.title: Hyoola Clear Cup Filled Citronella Votive Candles - 12 Hour Burn Time - 12-Pack, Ideal Bug Repellent Candles, European Made
product_meta.description:
Are you looking for a reliable mosquito repellent outdoor candles? Look no further than Hyoola’s Citronella Candles Outdoor Repellent votive citronella candles!

The citronella keeps bugs and mosquitos away from your event, while the candles for mosquitoes offers a clean, smokeless burn that looks beautiful, is odorless, and will enhance your outdoor event.

PRODUCT FEATURES:

 - Repellent Effect
- Indoor or outdoor candles for bugs
- Safe And Non-toxic
- 12 Hour Burn Time!!!
- Premium Grade Citronella Wax
- Smokeless And Lead-free Wick
- EU Manufactured

KEEPS BUGS AWAY

Everyone loves a great outdoor picnic or barbecue. The problem is those pesky flying bugs and mosquitoes that ruin the fun. With this misquito yard control candles, you can keep the party bug and mosquito free! Infused with citronella oil, fling creatures will hate this cintronella bug candle and want to stay far away.

CLEAN BURNING

Much as insects hate this candle, you will love it! Is a clean smokeless, odorless burn that is barely noticeable. Perfect for parties and events, this is great to use in centerpiece and other decorative purposes. 

Light up you next event in style. Light it up with Hyoola candles.
feature_bullets: NO MORE PESKY INSECTS: Effective in repelling mosquitos, gnats, and most other flying insects.
LONG LASTING: 12 hour burn time!!! #1 recommended outdoor mosquito repellent citronella candle .
SAFE & NON-TOXIC: Made in the European Union by the world's primer candle makers. Rest assured it's safe and non-toxic. Smokeless, Lead-free , safe wick.
MULTIPURPOSE: Perfect for outdoor wedding, backyard, camping, picnic, patio, gardens, backyards, BBQs, porch, deck or campsite.
SPECS: 1.7 inches (43mm) at the base, 2.4 inches (61mm) at the top rim, height is 2-inchs (51mm). COLOR: Yellow. Lightweight plastic cup. Indoor or outdoor use.
